title: Chiseling: The Art of Polishing Vibe Code
description: Continue published a blog post about 'Chiseling: The Art of Polishing Vibe Code', discussing techniques for refining AI-generated code to production quality.

title: Version 0.86.0 - GPT-5 and Grok-4 Support
description: Aider v0.86.0 added support for OpenAI GPT-5 models and xAI Grok-4, expanding the range of supported AI coding assistants.

title: GPT-5.3-Codex Generally Available
description: GitHub Copilot announced general availability of GPT-5.3-Codex, bringing advanced AI coding capabilities to Copilot users.

title: Fight Code Slop with Continuous AI
description: Continue published 'Fight Code Slop with Continuous AI', exploring workflows for maintaining code quality using continuous AI assistance.

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Fast Mode Preview
description: GitHub Copilot added preview support for Claude Opus 4.6 fast mode, providing faster response times for code generation tasks.

title: Claude Opus 4.6 Generally Available, Pinned Comments on Issues
description: GitHub Copilot announced general availability of Claude Opus 4.6 and introduced pinned comments on Issues feature for better code review workflows.

title: Claude and Codex Public Preview on GitHub
description: GitHub launched public preview of Claude and Codex AI models directly on GitHub platform, expanding AI-assisted coding capabilities.

title: Dependabot Proxy Open Source
description: GitHub open sourced Dependabot Proxy, a tool for managing dependency updates with improved security and performance.
